subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a day when catcher Rod Barajas was claimed off waivers by the Dodgers, Johan Santana lost for the second straight time in the final game of a seven-game trip.
snippet: On a day when catcher Rod Barajas was claimed off waivers by the Dodgers, Johan Santana lost for the second straight time in the final game of a seven-game trip.
